translations: 缺席者；不履行者；违反军规者

sentences.sentence: Default judgement was not regarded as the punishment to the defaulter.
sentences.translation: 缺席判决也不再被视为对缺席者的惩罚。

sentences.sentence: If there is no relevant office-holder referred to in paragraph, the defaulter to whom the report relates.
sentences.translation: 如没有段所指的有关人员该报告所关乎的失责人。

sentences.sentence: Where a relevant office-holder or defaulter receives pursuant to subsection (2) a report made pursuant to subsection (1).
sentences.translation: 凡有关人员或失责人依据第(2)款收到一份依据第(1)款作出的报告。
